We can help to enhance the patient experience to it’s fullest potential.

Practice Start-up / Expansion / Satellites

From turn-key to individual projects, the level of work and involvement is tailored for each practices’ explicit needs.

  • Pro Forma – One to Three Year Projections
  • Office Location Review
  • Space Analysis
  • Assess, Negotiate and implementation of Practice Management and Electronic Health Record System
  • Systems Assessment
  • Selection of Medical Equipment, Office Furniture, and Supplies
  • Employee Profiles
  • Staff Member Hiring
  • Managed Care Contract and Reimbursement Review
  • Renovation Management

Staff Member Recruiting and Hiring

Each staff position has value to your patient. Hire The Best and Keep Them! From Front Desk to the Administrator

After Advertising in key publications to attract the most qualified candidates, pre-screening and interviewing, the top three pre-screened prospective employees are presented to you to for the final decisions. This allows you the time to focus on the best possible candidates as you establish or rebuild standards and preferences to compliment the culture you would like to set in your practice.

Staff Training

Tailored Specifically for Your Practice and Population

While onsite, I am able to meet with each staff member on a one on one basis. This allows a tailored approach to improving processes, revenue and patient engagement on every level of healthcare in your practice.

Topics

  • Patient Accounts Receivables
  • Merging Offices and Systems
  • Customer Service
  • Revenue Cycle Operations and Financial Benchmarking
  • Front Desk Operations
  • Physician Conflict and Resolution
  • Internal Checks and Balances
  • Something Special to Your Practice? We can discuss if you like.

Staff Workflow / Role Definition

Bring Out Leadership Qualities In Your Staff!

  • Personnel Policies & Procedures Manual

  • Employee Profile (Re) Definition and Staff

  • Workflow/Staff Organization Training

  • Alternate Space Analysis

Interim Management – Administrative Search

Complete Administrative support and management functions for the entire practice as we recruit a new administrator

  • Interim Administrator role with a personal presence to support physicians and staff during transition to new Administrator.

  • Work with physicians to recruit, interview and select new Administrator as expediently as possible.

Patient Centered Medical Home (PCMH)

NCQA trained and certified to complete PCMH for your practice resulting in increased efficiencies and potential for higher income from payers!

  • PCMH is a qualifier for payers they can directly affect your reimbursement rates and patient access under new healthcare laws.

  • This certification can be approached on the level most beneficial for your practice.

Fraud and Embezzlement Protection – Practice Internal Checks and Balances

From the Front Desk To Insurance Reimbursements To Year-End Procedures, Every Cent That Enters And Leaves Your Practice Should Be Appropriately Applied, Confirmed And Balanced.

  • Review and “Gap” Analysis of Current Internal Controls Policies and Procedures

  • Identify “High Risk” Areas of Your Practice’s Financial Procedures

  • Train Staff on Updates Internal “Check and Balance” Policies

  • Comprehensive Report With Recommendations

Patient Accounts Receivable Staff Training

Training on patient collections is essential as patients are more responsible for their healthcare dollars.

  • One on one training with front desk and billing staff covering all points of collection from the initial appointment request to the claim being paid the first time, prompt pay discounts and other considerations specific to your specialty and population.

Patient Flow Analysis

Each practice has their style and methods – nevertheless we all need a solid foundation that ensures professionalism and patient access at every step and level of care.

  • Analyze and Assess Current Patient Flow of Your Practice

  • Transition to Streamlined Procedures That Affirm Your style and patient population

  • Customer Service Review and Recommendations and training.

Managed Care and Payer Contracting

Every Practice Has a Unique Value That CAN Be Conveyed to Payers

  • Current Fee Reimbursement to Proposed Impact Analysis

  • Provides one-on-one training so the practice may negotiate managed care contracts

  • Convey to Payers the Distinctive Value of Your Practice

  • Future Planning and Approach of Payer Relationships

Web Site Formatting and Design

Content is tailored from a patient’s perspective to ensure that access and centered care is as easily received online as it is in your practice.

Formatting and Design with most essential information to introduce your practice to patients and other providers

Patient Portal Design that best supports your current policies, procedures and patient optimization
